examples.korean: The idiom “Gyeon Mun Bal Geom” (“Jian Wen Ba Jian” in Chinese) consists of four characters, each of which means “to see”, “mosquito”, “to draw”, “sword”. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 고사성어 “견문발검” (見蚊拔劍)은 각각, "보다" (見), "모기" (蚊), "뽑다" (拔), "칼" (劍)을 뜻하는 네 글자로 구성되어있습니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: The idiom “Gyeon Mun Bal Geom” (“Jian Wen Ba Jian” in Chinese) consists of four characters, each of which means “to see”, “mosquito”, “to draw”, “sword”. Add to Wordbook
